description: This Polki Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a piece of art and a symbol of South Indian heritage. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds, coupled with expert Hyderabadi craftsmanship, ensures a lasting investment. Its timeless design makes it a cherished heirloom, to be passed down through generations. Polki Diamonds offer a unique vintage look, unlike the modern brilliant cut, making this haaram a truly unique choice. The careful arrangement of diamonds and rubies demonstrates the artisan's mastery and attention to detail. The antique finish enhances the richness and depth of the gold, creating a captivating aesthetic.
